quest.text: Solve this riddle to proceed: What has to be broken before you can use it?
Solve this riddle to proceed: What month of the year has 28 days?
Solve this riddle to proceed: What gets wet while drying?
Solve this riddle to proceed: What can't talk but will reply when spoken to?

buddy.name: Benny
buddy.info: Thank you for finding me! I was so lonely!

buddy.name: Mary
buddy.info: Thank you for finding me! I was really lost!

buddy.name: Harry
buddy.info: Thank you for finding me! It's so good to see you!

buddy.name: Penny
buddy.info: Yay! I see that you have found us all now, congratulations! Now you can finnish the game - press the button!

choises.text: The road splits, where do you want to go?
The road splits, where do you want to go?
There is a bridge here, where do you want to go?
Oh no, you are lost in the woods! What do you want to do?
